channel.title: Future bass - Blue-Jy [WIP, Collab Album?]
channel.description:
hey guys i started listening to future bass again and i tried to make it several times, but it always turns out terrible. i can't find the right sounds for chords or get the feel that I wanted to i decided to do a collab album to help with this
anyone who wants to join, please pm me so i'll know
also if you can give tips on future bass it would help me out so much!! :slight_smile: (looking at FL studio tutorials didn't help much for me..)
